meaning: scroll, volume, book, part, roll up, wind up, tie, coil, counter for texts (or book scrolls)

onyomiExamples.meaning: volume (of book), reel (of film), scroll (of books or paintings), roll (paper, etc.)
highlight, best part, stunning, incredible, superb
rolled tail (of a traditional Japanese hat), looped tail
sweeping conquest, sweeping over, conquering, invading

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to wind, to coil, to roll, to wear (e.g. turban, scarf), to envelope, to shroud, to outflank, to skirt, to link (verse), to move ahead (three hours, etc.), to move up
roll (e.g. of cloth), winding (e.g. watch), volume (of book), speeding up, heel (of a Japanese sandal)
roll (e.g. of cloth), winding (e.g. watch), volume (of book), speeding up, heel (of a Japanese sandal)
